titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Captain Charles Pasley, Acting Envoy Extraordinary to Persia

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the forwarding of various correspondence, the arrival of Faragula Khan (Nusukchee Bashee to the King of Persia) at Sheraz [Shiraz], an expected return visit to Bushire by Abdulla Khan to settle tribal disturbances, and an offer from Meerza Khuleel Khan to supply the British with intelligence from Tehran and Isfahan.
